attributes.action: to give discount to university students in Halls of Residence for TV Licences
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Students are in halls of residence for 38 weeks of the year and are still expected to pay the full cost of a TV licence. Each student is expected to have a TV licence some halls have upto 10 rooms per flat this amounts to £1425 per flat. We think this is wrong. Students walk away with thousands of pounds in debt, can't TV Licensing give students discount
